intro: Arnebia stenocalyx, commonly known as the narrow-leaved arnebia, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of central and southern China. It belongs to the family Geraniaceae and is characterized by its compact, evergreen shrub form. The plant produces clusters of small, pink to reddish-purple flowers during the spring and summer seasons. Its leaves are narrow and leathery, often covered in a fine layer of white wax. Arnebia stenocalyx is valued in traditional Chinese medicine for its purported medicinal properties.
